definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="84" pinned="false" w="254">This example will test for a specific block below what is running the procedure. If it is true, then it will run what you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PatrolBarrel</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">data merge block ~ ~ ~ {LootTable:"new_blocks:chests/patrol_barrel_opened"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="play_sound"><field
